positive: So yes, very good slim light laptop overall, 15.3" screen size is perfect too, though I hope these spinning wheel, fan noise, trackpad issues are all software related and get a quick fix from Lenovo.
Like a  (I type a lot, like really a lot, well, you see yourself),  (this would be great, to be able to finally efficiently use laptop without mouse), ,  (especially USB-C), , , , etc.
The screen is great, vibrant and with great blacks, despite being a IPS screen.
negative: While I could live with the Yoga's display, I really missed the haptic touchpad and hated that it only came with 16GB.
All IPS panels have IPS glow, but this one has the worst case of glow I've ever seen.

Unfortunately none of the reviewers actually had these exact SKUs (even reviewers in my region), so someone complaining about screen quality while having a worse screen or boasting good battery life with a FHD screen instead of a 3K oled is not really helpful.
